content: puff chevrons square by turquoizblue ©2008 this square is made using a combination of tunisian simple stitch and tunisian puff use hook and yarn of your choice to obtain desired gauge if necessary add or reduce chevron repeats abbreviations and symbol key | tunisian simple stitch tss | tunisian puff notes tss one row consists of one forward pass and one return pass puff st yo insert hook behind both front and back vertical bars yo pull up lp x 3 yo pull through 6 lps on hook chain 1 first st of each row is lp that remains on hook and last st is a tss into selvege instructions cast on 51 lps follow chart as written with first row being tss row 37 is bind off row turquoizblue ©2008 page 1 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 37 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 36 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 35 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 34 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 33 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 32 | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 31 | | |
